sia-desc: Allows for adding annotations to image files.
sia-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localisation and internationalisation file for the Semantic Image Annotator extension.
sia-special-intro: Welcome to the special page of the Semantic Image Annotator extension.
sia-reinstall-text:
Pressing the reinstall button to reinstall this extension. This will overwrite existing Templates, Forms, Properties and Categories that are related to this extension.

The following properties will be recreated:
*Property:Annotation_of
*Property:Annotation_code
*Property:AnnotationComment
*Property:LastModificationDate
*Property:LastModificationUser
*Property:AnnotationMetadata

The following categories will be recreated:
*Category:Annotation
*Category:ImageAnnotation

In addition, the following pages will be overwritten:
*Template:ImageAnnotation
*Form:ImageAnnotation

Moreover, links to existing Page Forms (but not the Page Forms themselves) will be deleted.
sia-request-reinstall: Links to existing Page Forms are deleted. Templates, Forms, Properties and Categories related to this extension will be overwritten.
sia-button-desc: Click here to annotate this article.
sia-repair-button-desc: Click here to repair moved annotations.
sia-repair-notification: Not all Annotations could be assigned correctly. Please start the Annotations Repair Mode.
sia-autogenerate-summary: Page was autogenerated by the Semantic Image Annotator extension.
sia-install-description: Click the Install button before using this extension. A form (Form:ImageAnnotation) and template (Template:ImageAnnotation) will be created.
sia-install-success: Installation finished successfully. Please Reload the Page.
sia-category-pageform-assignment-descrip: Here you can set up the Annotation categories used by this extension. You need to assign a Page Forms webform to any category and select a color.
sia-main-page-description: This Page shows all annotations of the file
sia-please-install: You have not yet installed the extension. Please go to Special Page.
sia-repair-welcome-text: In the following steps you can correct the moved positions of the annotations.
sia-repair-info-text: After clicking Repair you need to select new positions for the annotations.
sia-repair-all-done-text: Now you will be redirected to the article page.
